content:
FORM 8-K
CURRENT REPORT PURSUANT TO SECTION 13 OR 15(d) OF THE SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT OF 1934
Date of Report: January 18, 2024
UNITEDHEALTH GROUP INCORPORATED
Item 2.02 Results of Operations and Financial Condition
On January 18, 2024, UnitedHealth Group Incorporated announced its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year 2023. The Company reported strong performance across its Optum and UnitedHealthcare segments. Full year revenues increased reflecting growth in serving more people through diversified health benefits and services.
